languages.text: "Я тоже это слышал. Захлопнулась, распахнулась и снова захлопнулась — передавила в кашу тех, кто сквозь нее шел..."

traits.locale_text: "Я тоже это слышал. Захлопнулась, распахнулась и снова захлопнулась — передавила в кашу тех, кто сквозь нее шел..."

languages.text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже это слышал. Захлопнулась, распахнулась и снова захлопнулась — передавила в кашу тех, кто сквозь нее шел..."

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again — made mush out of those who were just trying to walk through..."
"Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again — made mush out of those who were just trying to walk through..."
"Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."
"Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."
"Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."
"Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

languages.text: « Oui, c'est ce que j'ai entendu, moi aussi. Elle s'est refermée, puis s'est rouverte avant de se refermer à nouveau, écrabouillant tous ceux qui la franchissaient à ce moment-là... »
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, c'est ce que j'ai entendu, moi aussi. Elle s'est refermée, puis s'est rouverte avant de se refermer à nouveau, écrabouillant tous ceux qui la franchissaient à ce moment-là... »

languages.text: “是啊，我也是这么听说的。门突然关上，又打开了，然后又关上了，把里面所有人都碾成了肉泥……”
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我也是这么听说的。门突然关上，又打开了，然后又关上了，把里面所有人都碾成了肉泥……”

languages.text: "Ja, das habe ich auch gehört. Sie ist zugegangen, wieder auf, wieder zu, hat jemanden zermatscht, der darin gefangen war ..."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, das habe ich auch gehört. Sie ist zugegangen, wieder auf, wieder zu, hat jemanden zermatscht, der darin gefangen war ..."

languages.text: «Sí, es lo mismo que he oído yo. Se cerró, luego se abrió, y luego se volvió a cerrar, machacando a todos los que la atravesaban...».
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, es lo mismo que he oído yo. Se cerró, luego se abrió, y luego se volvió a cerrar, machacando a todos los que la atravesaban...».

languages.text: 「あぁ、俺もそう聞いたよ。閉まって、また開いて、またまた閉まって、巻き込まれた奴らは扉の餌食だったってな…」
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、俺もそう聞いたよ。閉まって、また開いて、またまた閉まって、巻き込まれた奴らは扉の餌食だったってな…」

languages.text: "Evet, ben de öyle duydum. Kapanmış, açılmış, sonra tekrar kapanmış, denk gelenleri ezmiş."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, that's what I heard too. It closed, then opened, then closed again, mulching everyone who got caught in it..."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, ben de öyle duydum. Kapanmış, açılmış, sonra tekrar kapanmış, denk gelenleri ezmiş."
